Text: E̩gba kʼe̩ gugu kʼe̩ bʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da je̩ e̩wñ,
iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ je̩ e̩wñ nana
E̩ ki che̩ño̩ e̩wñ ayaga-wñ n,
E̩ ki chʼo̩la-we̩ o̩bata kʼe̩ chʼanana n;
Eju-we̩ dʼo, i le me̩; i ache ika ñw o̩la-wñ chuu,
E̩ ki je̩ uje̩wñ e̩ne̩ ki nʼeju bie̩ne̩ n;
todu alu kʼi akpibe ef uwñ abe̩le̩ i de̩.
O̩we̩ o̩je̩ kʼe̩ du mi le̩, uwe̩ are̩ rinyo̩,
E̩ ki kʼo̩la kʼeti ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ ki gbo̩ n,
E̩ ki mʼoli eju o̩me̩ ane̩ abo igbelegbele chi kwʼe̩gu n
todu efu-ma pio̩o̩ kʼi agba ma tane̩ chʼagbiti;
Dʼe̩do̩-we̩ te̩ ñw e̩wñ eko̩che̩
E̩ ki do̩wo̩mʼo̩la ekʼimo̩to̩ n;
E̩ fʼo̩kpa gwʼo̩ mak onugo-wñ e̩ gba
O̩ma-mi, iche̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-we̩ nʼibe,
Ochochi, efu-mi agwoye
E̩do̩-we̩ ki lie̩na ame̩nadure n,
Todu o̩jo̩ o̩na-wñ ado̩mo̩ chuu,
Gbo̩, o̩ma-mi, kʼe̩ nʼibe,
E̩ ki dʼef amañmo̩te̩ n,
Todu añmo̩te̩ kpai achajefu adʼe̩nale,
Netirʼata-we̩ kʼi bi uwe̩,
Fʼochochi la, e̩ ki la dʼu ta n;
Ata e̩no̩kpakpa ayo̩ tabale;
Che kʼe̩do̩ ata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩ ki bo̩,
O̩ma-mi, dʼe̩do̩-we̩ ñw mi,
Todu ajo̩ko̩ chʼo̩go̩lo̩ kʼi nefu;
Ochochi, i akpala anede one̩ dab adinya,
E̩ne̩ ne̩ aya? E̩ne̩ ne̩ atogwo?
Owñ chʼabo ku ma kpo̩kpe̩ ugbo o̩te̩,
E̩ ki dʼeju gʼo̩te̩ e̩gba kʼi bte̩nyu n,
E̩gba otitala-wñ i ulʼone̩ dab ejo̩,
Eju-we̩ ali e̩wñ ejaduña,
Ochochi, uwe̩ adab e̩ne̩ kʼi dachi alumeji ohimini,
Ma fʼumi gwo, i la che mi abu du n;
